title: Sri Lanka Treasury Secretary resigns
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s Treasury Secretary S R Attygalle has resigned his portfolio, reports said adding to the spate of resignations of ministers as the country’s economic crisis turned into a political crisis.
Sri Lanka’s newly appointed Finance Minister Ali Sabry had also resigned a day after his appointment.
Sabry was appointed amid growing calls for President Gotabaya Rajapaksa and his brother to resign.
Sri Lanka is in a deep economic crisis after tax cuts and money printed by an intermediate regime central bank created forex shortages.
